Enroll Your Child Today!

Pre-Primary to Senior Secondary (Nursery - Class XII)

Apply Now

Admission Process

Follow these simple steps to enroll your child at The First Step International School

1

Enquiry & Registration

Fill out the admission enquiry form online or visit the school office for registration.

2

Document Submission

Submit required documents including birth certificate, previous school records, and photographs.

3

Interaction/Assessment

Schedule an interaction session for the child and parents with the admission committee.

4

Admission Confirmation

Upon successful assessment, confirm admission by paying the fee and completing formalities.

Admission Procedure

Detailed step-by-step guide with required documents and eligibility criteria

Fee Structure

Complete fee details for all classes with payment schedules and policies
